sourcesContent:
import React, { memo } from "react"
import { Drawer, DrawerContent, DrawerOverlay, DrawerHeader, DrawerBody, useDisclosure, Box, Text, Divider, Link, DrawerCloseButton, Flex } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import { RiMenuFoldLine } from "react-icons/ri";


const MenuBar = memo(() => {
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
    const btnRef = React.useRef()

    return (
        <>
            <Flex w='70px' h='70px' cursor='pointer' flexDirection='column' justify='center'>
                <Text letterSpacing='1px' fontWeight='600' mb='-5px' fontSize='11px'>MENU</Text>
                <RiMenuFoldLine onClick={onOpen} size='40px' ref={btnRef}/>
            </Flex>
            <Drawer placement='right' size='xs' onClose={onClose} isOpen={isOpen} motionPreset='scale'>
                <DrawerOverlay />
                <DrawerContent>
                    <DrawerCloseButton />
                    <DrawerHeader borderBottomWidth="1px">MENU</DrawerHeader>
                    <DrawerBody p='0'>
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>プロフィール</Link>
                        </Box>
                        <Divider />
                        <Box w="100%" p='16px 24px' _hover={{opacity: 0.8, backgroundColor: '#d7d7d8'}}>
                            <Link as='a' textDecoration='none'>お気に入りアニメ</Link>
                        </Box>
                    </DrawerBody>
                </DrawerContent>
            </Drawer>
        </>
    )
})

export default MenuBar
